business_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the business account associated with the media.

page_id.description: The unique identifier for the Instagram page associated with the media.

caption.description: The caption or description provided for the media.

comments_count.description: The total number of comments received on the media.

id.description: The unique identifier for the media item.

ig_id.description: The Instagram-specific identifier for the media item.

is_comment_enabled.description: A flag indicating whether comments are enabled for the media.

like_count.description: The total number of likes received on the media.

media_type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video) of the media item.

media_product_type.description: The product type associated with the media (e.g., shopping product).

media_url.description: The URL for accessing the media content of the media item.

owner.description: Contains information about the owner of the post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner of the media item.

permalink.description: The permanent link to the media item on Instagram.

shortcode.description: The unique shortcode assigned to the media item.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL for accessing the thumbnail image of the media item.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the media item was created.

username.description: The username of the owner of the media item.

children.description: Contains an array of media items that are part of the post.

items.description: Properties of each media item like image, caption, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the child media item.

ig_id.description: The Instagram-specific identifier for the child media item.

media_type.description: The type of media of the child item (e.g., image, video).

media_url.description: The URL for accessing the media content of the child item.

owner.description: Contains information about the owner of the media item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner of the child media item.

permalink.description: The permanent link to the child media item on Instagram.

shortcode.description: The unique shortcode assigned to the child media item.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL for accessing the thumbnail image of the child media item.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the child media item was created.

username.description: The username of the owner of the child media item.

business_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the Instagram business account associated with the media.

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the Instagram page where the media is posted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the media.

ig_reels_avg_watch_time.description: The average watch time of Instagram Reels videos in seconds

ig_reels_video_view_total_time.description: The total watch time of Instagram Reels videos in seconds.

impressions.description: The number of times the media has been displayed to users.

reach.description: The number of unique users who have seen the media.

saved.description: The number of times users have saved the media.

video_views.description: The total number of views on video media.

comments.description: The number of comments received on the media.

likes.description: The number of likes received on the media.

shares.description: The number of times the media has been shared.

total_interactions.description: The total number of interactions (likes, comments, shares) on the media.

plays.description: The number of times the media has been played.

ig_reels_aggregated_all_plays_count.description: The number of times of Instagram Reels gets reproduced after an impression is counted.

clips_replays_count.description: The number of times the reel gets reproduced after the first one.

follows.description: The number of accounts that started to follow the profile.

profile_visits.description: The number of times the profile has been visited.

page_id.description: The unique identifier for the user's associated Instagram page.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user's account.

biography.description: The biography or description provided by the user in their profile.

ig_id.description: The Instagram ID associated with the user's account.

followers_count.description: The number of followers the user has on Instagram.

follows_count.description: The number of accounts that the user follows on Instagram.

media_count.description: The total number of media items (posts) uploaded by the user.

name.description: The name displayed on the user's Instagram account.

profile_picture_url.description: The URL to the user's profile picture.

username.description: The username used by the user to log in to their Instagram account.

website.description: The website link provided by the user on their Instagram profile.

page_id.description: The identifier of the Instagram page associated with the insights

business_account_id.description: The identifier of the business account to which the insights belong

breakdown.description: The breakdown of the insights data, such as age, gender, location, etc.

metric.description: The specific metric or measure tracked in the insights data

value.description: The actual value of the metric for the given breakdown and page

business_account_id.description: The ID of the business account associated with the story.

page_id.description: ID of the page associated with the story.

caption.description: The caption associated with the story.

like_count.description: Number of likes on the story.

media_type.description: Type of media in the story (image, video, etc.).

media_product_type.description: Product type associated with the media in the story.

media_url.description: URL of the media in the story.

owner.description: The user who owns the story.

id.description: ID of the owner of the story.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail of the media in the story.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the story was posted.

business_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the business account associated with the story insights.

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the associated page where the story was posted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the story insights record.

impressions.description: The number of times the story was viewed.

reach.description: The number of unique accounts that viewed the story.

replies.description: The number of replies or interactions generated by the story.

follows.description: The number of accounts that started to follow the account.

profile_visits.description: The number of times the profile was visited.

shares.description: The number of times the story has been shared.

total_interactions.description\u00a8: The number of replies and shares of the story.

page_id.description: The unique identifier for the user's Instagram page.

business_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the user's business account.

date.description: The date and time the insights data was fetched.

follower_count.description: The total number of followers for the user's account.

get_directions_clicks.description: The number of clicks to get directions to the user's business location.

impressions.description: The total number of times the user's content has been displayed.

phone_call_clicks.description: The number of clicks to call the user's business phone number.

profile_views.description: The total number of views on the user's profile.

reach.description: The total number of unique accounts that have seen the user's content.

text_message_clicks.description: The number of clicks to send text messages to the user.

website_clicks.description: The number of clicks on the website link in the user's profile.

impressions_week.description: The total number of impressions in the last week.

reach_week.description: The total reach in the last week.

impressions_days_28.description: The total number of impressions in the last 28 days.

reach_days_28.description: The total reach in the last 28 days.

online_followers.description: The number of followers who are currently online.

email_contacts.description: The number of email contacts associated with the user's account.
